Row.Text: You have not selected enough City-States to fill the available City-State slots. Starting the game will result in only the selected City-States being created. Is this okay?
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to foreign cities earn +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each Luxury resource at the destination.
Your cities get +15% [ICON_Production] Production towards wonders.
Your Bonus resources behave like Luxury resources, providing 1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity per type.
Your Encampment districts provide +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity each.
Your cities earn +15% [ICON_Science] Science whenever you are not at war with any civilization.
Provides you with 1 of each Strategic resource you have revealed but do not own.
Your cities get +20% [ICON_Production] Production towards city projects.
Your [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Posts in foreign cities provide +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold to your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes passing through or going to the city.
Automatically converts to the Religion you founded, and exerts pressure for that Religion as if it were a Holy City.
Your units receive double experience from battles they initiate.
Receive a [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic every time you discover a new natural wonder, and earn +50% [ICON_Faith] Faith from all [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics.
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to any city-state provide +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every specialty district in the origin city.

Your Builders can now make Colossal Head improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Colossal Heads provide +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every 2 adjacent Rainforest. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every 2 adjacent Woods. Cannot be built on Snow or Snow Hills.
Your Trader units are immune to being plundered on water tiles.
Your cities have full [ICON_Housing] Housing from water, as if they were all next to a River.
Your districts on or next to Coast or Lake tiles provide +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
Your light and heavy cavalry units have +5 [ICON_Strength] Strength when fighting on hill tiles.
When you enter a new era, earn 1 random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka from that era.

Your districts provide +1 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person point of their type ([ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician for Theater Square districts).
Regional effects from your Industrial Zone and Entertainment Complex districts reach 3 tiles farther.

City Center buildings and Encampment district buildings can be bought with [ICON_Faith] Faith. Cost of purchasing Ancient, Medieval, and Renaissance Walls is reduced, but they can only be bought with [ICON_Faith] Faith.
When you enter a new era, earn 1 random [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration from that era.
Your Apostle units can choose from any possible promotion instead of receiving a random promotion.
Receive the [ICON_RESOURCE_CINNAMON] Cinnamon and [ICON_RESOURCE_CLOVES] Cloves Luxury resources. These cannot be earned any other way in the game, and provide 6 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities each.
Venice
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to foreign cities earn +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each Luxury resource at the destination.
Anshan
+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Work of Writing. +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each [ICON_GreatWork_RELIC] Relic and [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifact.
Land combat units are 20% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each Encampment district building in that city.
Your cities with Holy Sites exert pressure as if they were Holy Cities (4x Religion pressure on all cities within 10 tiles).
You receive +2 Loyalty per turn in cities for each Encampment district building.

Your districts with a building provide +1 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person point of their type ([ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician for Theater Square districts with a building).
Regional effects from your Industrial Zone, Water Park, and Entertainment Complex districts reach 3 tiles farther.
For the highest active Alliance Level, all your Theater Square districts receive +50% adjacency bonus.
Akkad
Melee and anti-cavalry unit's attacks do full damage to the city's Walls.
Bologna

Your districts with a building provide +1 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person point of their type ([ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician for Theater Square districts with a building).
Cahokia

Your Builders can now make Cahokia Mounds improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Cahokia Mounds provide +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Cities receive +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity from their first Cahokia Mound improvement. Upon discovering Natural History, cities receive +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity from their second Cahokia Mound improvement. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for every 2 adjacent Districts once Feudalism is discovered or for every adjacent District once Replaceable Parts is researched. Provides +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing. Receive an additional [ICON_HOUSING] Housing once Cultural Heritage is discovered. Cannot be built adjacent to other Cahokia Mounds.
Cardiff
Cities receive +2 [ICON_Power] Power for every Harbor building.
Fez
When you use a religious unit to convert a city for the first time earn 20 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science per [ICON_Citizen] Population of that city (on Standard Speed).
Mexico City
Regional effects from your Industrial Zone, Water Park, and Entertainment Complex districts reach 3 tiles farther.
Nazca

Your Builders can now make Nazca Line improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Nazca Lines provide +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith to adjacent tiles. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith to adjacent tiles with a resource. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food to adjacent Desert and Desert Hill tiles after discovering Civil Service. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to adjacent flat tiles after researching Mass Production. +1 Appeal. Can only be built on flat Desert. This tile cannot be worked.
Ngazargamu
Land combat or Support units are 20% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each Encampment district building in that city.
Rapa Nui

Your Builders can now make Moai improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Moai provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every 2 adjacent Moai. +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture if on or adjacent to a Volcanic Soil tile. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture if adjacent to a Coast or Lake tile . Additional [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism as you advance through the Civics and Technology Tree. Can be built on Plains, Plains Hills, Grassland, Grassland Hills, or Volcanic Soil. Cannot be placed adjacent to a Woods or Rainforest tile.
Provides you with 2 of each Strategic resource per turn that you have revealed but have not improved.

Your Builders can now make Monastery improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Monasteries provide +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. +15 HP healing for friendly religious unit on this tile that has not attacked this turn. +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for every 2 adjacent Districts. Provides +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing. Receive an additional [ICON_HOUSING] Housing once Colonialism is discovered. Cannot be built next to another Monastery.

Your Builders can now make Colossal Head improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Colossal Heads provide +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every 2 adjacent Rainforest or for every adjacent Rainforest once Humanism is discovered. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every 2 adjacent Woods or for every adjacent Woods once Humanism is discovered. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from [ICON_FAITH] Faith once Flight is discovered. Cannot be built on Snow or Snow Hills.

Your Builders can now make Alcázar improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Alcázars provide +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture. Provides [ICON_SCIENCE] Science equal to 50% of the tile's Appeal. Occupying unit receives +4 [ICON_Strength] Defense Strength, and automatically gains 2 turns of fortification. Provides [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism after researching Flight. Cannot be built next to another Alcázar.
Auckland
Antananarivo
Armagh
Granada
Muscat
Mitla
Shallow water tiles you own provide +1 [ICON_Production] Production. Additional +1 when you reach the Industrial era.
Your Civilization gains +2% [ICON_Culture] Culture for each Great Person it has ever earned, up to a total of +30%.

Your Builders can now make Monastery improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Monasteries provide +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. +15 HP healing for friendly religious unit on this tile that has not attacked this turn. Cannot be built next to another Monastery

Your Builders can now make Alcázar improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Alcázars provide +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture. Occupying unit receives +4 [ICON_Strength] Defense Strength, and automatically gains 2 turns of fortification. Cannot be built next to another Alcázar.
+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in cities with a Commercial Hub district.
City growth rate is 15% higher in cities with a Campus district.
Ayutthaya
Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 10% of the construction cost when finishing buildings.
Chinguetti
International and domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes receive +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for every follower in this city, of your founded or majority religion.
Johannesburg
Cities receive +1 [ICON_Production] Production for every improved resource type. After researching Industrialization it becomes +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
Nalanda

Your Builders can now make Mahavihara improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +1 [Icon_Housing] Housing. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every adjacent Holy Site district and +1 [ICON_Science] Science for every adjacent Campus district. After researching Scientific Theory receive an additional +1 [Icon_Science] Science for every adjacent Campus. When a player constructs their first Mahavihara receive a random technology. Must be built on flat terrain not adjacent to another Mahavihara.
Samarkand

Your Builders can now make Trading Dome improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every adjacent Luxury resource. Your outgoing international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes grant +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold per Trading Dome at the origin. Cannot be built next to another Trading Dome.
Wolin

Receive [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points when a land unit defeats a major or minor civilization's unit and receive [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral points when a naval unit defeats a major or minor civilization's unit equal to 25% of the opposing unit's strength (Standard Speed).
Caguana

Your Builders can now make Batey improvements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every adjacent Bonus resource and Entertainment Complex (increased to +2 [Icon_Culture] Culture when Exploration is discovered). Provides [Icon_Tourism] Tourism after researching Flight. Cannot be built adjacent to another Batey.
Hunza
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes generate +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every 5 tiles they travel.
Lahore

Your cities can now train Nihang units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A unit with a unique Promotion tree that can be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith. [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength is increased when Barracks, Armory, and Military Academy buildings are first constructed.
Singapore
Your cities receive +2 [ICON_Production] Production for each foreign civilization they have a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to.
Taruga
+5% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science in all cities for each different improved Strategic resource they have.
Vatican City
When you activate a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person they spread 400 Religious pressure of your founded (or majority) religion to cities within 10 tiles.
